channel.title: Server online For others,but only when im on? :\
channel.description:
a few weeks back i made a server for me and friends to play on (well,made it,but didn't start changing things up till a few days ago) anyway,it lets them go online,with the exception that i am logged in. meaning if i'm not logged in (or have recently logged in in the passed,20 minutes or so) so if they wanted to play well i was away,i will need to keep an account logged in,auto clicking or whatever i have to do to keep it logged in,so they can log in/out. i've tried the auto restarter to go off every now and then (well, different ones) and once they restart it will not let them log in until i have logged in but,if i were to logg out,and they were playing and dissconnected they wouldnt be able to get back on
(seems to be going in circles so ill stop there)
first i thought it could have been something coded in or something,but another friend uses the same source,and it doesnt do that for him source:delta
anyone know a fix for this?
could it be that i did something wrong when portforwarding,or accepting it through on firewall?

item.title: Server online For others,but only when im on? :\
item.dc:creator: @Doom32dd Doom32dd
item.description:
@Doom32dd wrote:

hmm, did you do any coding to it? if you did you prolly messed it up a little and need to download the source and start all over again…

if you didnt, try another source and see if it works

nothing much else to say

Read full topic
item.source: Server online For others,but only when im on? :\

item.title: Server online For others,but only when im on? :\
item.dc:creator: @hairyballzonya hairyballzonya
item.description:
@hairyballzonya wrote:

a few weeks back i made a server for me and friends to play on
(well,made it,but didn’t start changing things up till a few days ago)
anyway,it lets them go online,with the exception that i am logged in.
meaning if i’m not logged in (or have recently logged in in the passed,20 minutes or so)
so if they wanted to play well i was away,i will need to keep an account logged in,auto clicking or whatever i have to do to keep it logged in,so they can log in/out.
i’ve tried the auto restarter to go off every now and then (well, different ones)
and once they restart it will not let them log in until i have logged in
but,if i were to logg out,and they were playing and dissconnected they wouldnt be able to get back on

(seems to be going in circles so ill stop there)

first i thought it could have been something coded in or something,but another friend uses the same source,and it doesnt do that for him
source:delta

anyone know a fix for this?

could it be that i did something wrong when portforwarding,or accepting it through on firewall?
